Description: Site Establishment Design Drawing Set - CAD drafting and production (4 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for drawing production without vendor quotes or rate tables

Description: Site Establishment Technical Specification - specification writing (2 specifications)
Notes: Allowance for specification writing without rate tables

Description: Site Establishment Procedures - procedure development (3 procedures)
Notes: Allowance for PM procedure development

Description: Contractor's Equipment Schedule - project controls documentation (2 documents)
Notes: Allowance for equipment schedule preparation

Description: Road Access & Security Planning - access/security process documentation (3 plans)
Notes: Allowance for security planning and procedure development

Description: Pre-Works Road Condition Survey - field survey and photo documentation
Notes: Allowance for surveyor services without vendor quote

Description: Post-Works Road Condition Survey - survey and deficiency closeout
Notes: Allowance for post-construction survey services

Description: Road Deficiency Remediation - asphalt patching and restoration work
Notes: Placeholder for road restoration; highly variable based on actual damage

Description: Temporary Water Supply Design - utility design drawings (3 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for water supply design effort

Description: Temporary Water Supply Materials - pipe fittings backflow preventer valves
Notes: Material allowance without vendor quotes or site layout distances

Description: Temporary Water Supply Installation - plumbing labor connection testing
Notes: Installation labor allowance without rate tables

Description: Security Gate & Access Control Installation - gate hardware and system install
Notes: Allowance for security equipment and installation

Description: Temporary Site Facilities - Materials (office trailers welfare facilities fencing)
Notes: Material component of site facilities allowance; breakdown: trailers $300k fencing $150k misc $50k

Description: Temporary Site Infrastructure - Construction (laydown electrical utilities signage)
Notes: Construction component of site infrastructure allowance; breakdown: laydown $150k electrical $120k welfare $80k

Description: Security Gate Staffing - construction phase security operations
Notes: 24-month gate staffing allowance (12hr/day 6day/week @ $30/hr); hours TBD from schedule

Description: Construction Indirects - field supervision site overhead QA/QC (factor-based)
Notes: 18% of CD base ($475k CD × 0.18); factor from fallback model

Description: EPCM / Project Management - PKG-00 allocation (factor-based)
Notes: 6% of (CD+CI+MAT) = 6% × ($475k + $265.5k + $520k) = $75.6k; factor from fallback model

Description: Procurement Services - vendor coordination expediting (factor-based)
Notes: 2% of MAT = 2% × $520k; factor from fallback model

Description: Demolition Design Drawing Set - CAD drafting and production (demolition plans removal sequence disposal location plans ~6 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for demolition drawing production; more complex than site establishment due to phasing and marine interface

Description: Demolition Technical Specification - specification writing (demolition spec disposal requirements)
Notes: Allowance for specification writing; includes performance materials workmanship and disposal requirements sections

Description: Demolition Procedures - method statement and procedure development (5 procedures: general plus Track 6 Dolphin 2 fencing salt tent)
Notes: Allowance for HSE procedure development; Track 6 and Dolphin 2 procedures require specialized content

Description: Demolition Installation & Test Records - QA/QC documentation setup and record preparation
Notes: Allowance for QA/QC documentation templates record setup and closeout documentation

Description: Track 6 Rail Demolition - rail track removal ballast removal tie disposal (assume ~500 LF rail track)
Notes: Placeholder for Track 6 demolition; actual cost depends on track length condition and ballast contamination status

Description: Dolphin 2 Marine Demolition - marine structure removal including barge/crane mobilization pile cutting deck removal marine debris control
Notes: Marine demolition requires specialized marine equipment and crew; placeholder based on typical marine pile structure removal - highly variable

Description: Fencing Removal - perimeter fencing demolition and disposal (assume ~2000 LF chain-link or similar)
Notes: Placeholder for fencing removal; relatively simple scope but length unknown

Description: Salt Tent Dismantling - building structure demolition foundation removal site restoration
Notes: Placeholder for salt tent demolition; cost depends on structure type size and foundation requirements

Description: Demolition Materials and Temporary Works - protection barriers dust control erosion control disposal containers
Notes: Materials allowance for temporary works and protection measures during demolition

Description: Hazardous Materials Contingency Placeholder - potential asbestos lead or contaminated materials (hazmat survey pending)
Notes: Contingency placeholder per D-016; hazmat presence unknown - if survey confirms hazmat actual costs may be significantly higher

Description: Waste Disposal and Hauling - demolition waste transport to disposal/recycling facilities (concrete steel wood rail materials)
Notes: Placeholder for waste disposal; actual cost depends on material volumes disposal distances and tipping fees

Description: Construction Indirects - field supervision safety oversight QA/QC coordination (factor-based)
Notes: 18% of CD base ($950k CD x 0.18 = $171k); factor from fallback model per D-017

Description: EPCM / Project Management - PKG-01 allocation (factor-based)
Notes: 6% of (CD+CI+MAT) = 6% x ($950k + $171k + $40k) = $69.7k; factor from fallback model per D-017

Description: Procurement Services - vendor coordination expediting (factor-based)
Notes: 2% of MAT = 2% x $40k = $800; factor from fallback model per D-017
